title: Abomination
description: "Foolish rabble! You are beneath me!"

title: Absorbing Man
description: On Reveal: If the last card you played has an On Reveal, copy its text. (if it's in play)

title: Adam Warlock
description: After each turn, draw a card if you're winning here.

title: Aero
description: On Reveal: Move the last enemy card played anywhere to this location.

title: Agatha Harkness
description: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

title: Agent 13
description: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand.

title: Agent Coulson
description: On Reveal: Add a random 4-Cost and 5-Cost card to your hand.

title: Alioth
description: On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy cards here.

title: America Chavez
description: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck +2 Power.

title: Angel
description: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your hand or deck to replace it.

title: Angela
description: After you play a card here, +2 Power.

title: Annihilus
description: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that can't.

title: Ant Man
description: Ongoing: If your side of this location is full, +4 Power.

title: Apocalypse
description: When you discard this, put it back with +4 Power.

title: Arishem
description: At the start of the game, +1 Max Energy. Shuffle 12 random cards into your deck.

title: Armor
description: Ongoing: Cards here can't be destroyed.

title: Arnim Zola
description: On Reveal: Destroy one of your other cards here to copy it at the other locations.

title: Attuma
description: After each turn, destroy this if you have another card here.

title: Baron Mordo
description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.

title: Baron Zemo
description: On Reveal: Recruit the lowest-Cost card from your opponent's deck to your side of this location.

title: Bast
description: On Reveal: Set the Power of all cards in your hand to 3.

title: Beast
description: On Reveal: Return your other cards here to your hand. They cost 1 less next turn.

title: Beta Ray Bill
description: On Reveal: Shuffle Stormbreaker into your deck.

title: Bishop
description: After you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

title: Black Bolt
description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your opponent's hand.

title: Black Cat
description: If this is in your hand after the turn, discard it.

title: Black Knight
description: After you discard a card, add the Ebony Blade to your hand with that card's Power. (once per game)

title: Black Panther
description: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

title: Black Swan
description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 1-Cost cards cost 0.

title: Black Widow
description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand.

title: Blade
description: On Reveal: Discard the rightmost card from your hand.

title: Blink
description: On Reveal: Swap the last card you played with a higher-Cost card from your deck.

title: Blob
description: On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 15 or more Power. Ongoing: Can't be moved.

title: Blue Marvel
description: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

title: Brood
description: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings here with the same Power.

title: Broodling
description: "We are Brood, from Broodworld. You are lunch."

title: Bucky Barnes
description: When this is destroyed, replace it with the Winter Soldier.

title: Bullseye
description: On Reveal: The next card you draw will be a 2-Cost card. (if any are left)

title: Cable
description: On Reveal: Draw a card from your opponent's deck.

title: Caiera
description: Ongoing: Your 1 and 6-Cost cards can't be destroyed.

title: Cannonball
description: On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a Rock.

title: Captain America
description: Ongoing: Your other cards here have +1 Power.

title: Captain Marvel
description: At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the game. (If possible)

title: Carnage
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

title: Cerebro
description: Ongoing: Your highest-Power cards have +2 Power.

title: Cloak
description: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

title: Colleen Wing
description: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.

title: Colossus
description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

title: Corvus Glaive
description: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand to get +1 Max Energy.

title: Cosmo
description: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen here.

title: Crossbones
description: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.

title: Crystal
description: On Reveal: Each player draws a card.

title: Cull Obsidian
description: You can only play this where you have a 1-Cost card.

title: Cyclops
description: "Let's move, X-Men."

title: Dagger
description: When this moves to a location, +3 Power for each enemy card there.

title: Daken
description: On Reveal: Add the Muramasa Shard to your hand.

title: Daredevil
description: On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you make your own.

title: Darkhawk
description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your opponent's deck.

title: Dazzler
description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each location that's full on your side.

title: Deadpool
description: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the Power.

title: Death
description: Costs 1 less for each card destroyed this game.

title: Deathlok
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here.

title: Debrii
description: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

title: Destroyer
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.

description: Ongoing: +2 Power for each card in your hand.

description: On Reveal: Next turn, you get +2 Energy.

description: On Reveal: Add a 5-Power DoomBot to each other location.

title: Doctor Strange
description: On Reveal: Move your highest-Power card(s) to this location.

title: Domino
description: You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.

title: Doombot
description: "Doom is supreme!"

description: "zzzzzzZZZTT!"

description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards here.

description: When you end a turn with unspent Energy, +2 Power. (if in hand or in play)

title: Evolved Shocker

description: On Reveal: Afflict 3 enemy cards here with -1 Power.

description: On Reveal: Afflict an enemy card here with -1 Power.

description: On Reveal: Return your 1-Cost cards to your hand.

description: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand to destroy a random enemy card.

description: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

title: Ghost
description: Ongoing: Your cards are always revealed last. (Their On Reveal abilities happen last.)

description: On Reveal: Bring back one of your discarded cards to this location.

title: Ghost-Spider
description: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.

description: On Reveal: Other cards can't be revealed this turn.

title: Goose

Grand Master

description: On Reveal: Shuffle Mjolnir into your deck.

title: Tiger Spirit
description: "Vengeance is mine!"

title: Time Stone
description: On Reveal: Draw a card and give it -1 Cost.

title: Titania
description: After ANY card is played here, this card switches sides.

title: Toad
description: On Reveal: Move the last card you played to this location.

title: Typhoid Mary
description: Ongoing: Your other cards have -1 Power.

title: U.S. Agent
description: Ongoing: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards here have -4 Power.

title: Uatu the Watcher
description: At the start of the game, shows the right location to you.

title: Ultron
description: On Reveal: Deploy four 1-Power Drones to each other location.

title: Uncle Ben
description: When this card is destroyed, add Spider-Man to your hand.

title: Valentina
description: On Reveal: Add a random 6-Cost card to your hand. Give it -2 Cost and -3 Power.

title: Valkyrie
description: On Reveal: Set ALL cards here to 3 Power.

title: Venom
description: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. Add their Power to this card.

title: Vibranium
description: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed.

title: Viper
description: On Reveal: One of your other cards here switches sides.

title: Vision
description: You can move this each turn.

title: Viv Vision
description: When you move a card to a location, move this card there as well.

title: Vulture
description: When this card moves, +6 Power.

title: War Machine
description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, nothing can stop you from playing cards anywhere.

title: Warpath
description: Ongoing: If any of your locations are empty, +5 Power.

title: Wasp
description: "My secret power is that I get things done."

title: Wave
description: On Reveal: All cards cost a maximum of 4 until the end of next turn.

title: Werewolf By Night
description: After you play a card, move there to gain +2 Power if it has an On Reveal.

title: White Queen
description: On Reveal: Copy the highest-Cost card in your opponent's hand into your hand.

title: White Tiger
description: On Reveal: Add a 8-Power Tiger to another location.

title: White Widow
description: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Kiss to your opponent's side of this location.

title: Widow's Bite
description: While this is in your hand, you can't draw cards.

title: Widow's Kiss
description: Ongoing: This has -4 Power. Disable this ability if your side of this location is full.

title: Winter Soldier
description: "It's time for me to face the past."

title: Witchfire
description: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card, increase its cost by 1.

title: Wolfsbane
description: On Reveal: +2 Power for each other card you have here.

title: Wolverine
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it with +2 Power at a random location.

title: Wong
description: Ongoing: Your On Reveal abilities here happen twice.

title: X-23
description: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

title: Yellowjacket
description: On Reveal: Afflict your other cards here with -1 Power.

title: Yo-Yo
description: When this card moves, move it back with +1 Power.

title: Yondu
description: On Reveal: Destroy the lowest-Cost card in your opponent's deck.

title: Zabu
description: On Reveal: Until the end of next turn, your 4-Cost cards cost 1 less.

title: Zero
description: On Reveal: Remove the abilities on the next card you play.
